name: apptainer

conflicts.name: arch=darwin-None-None
conflicts.description: apptainer: singularity requires a Linux VM on Windows & Mac

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Apptainer is an open source container platform designed to be simple,
fast, and secure. Many container platforms are available, but Apptainer
is designed for ease-of-use on shared systems and in high performance
computing (HPC) environments. Needs post-install chmod/chown steps to
enable full functionality. See package definition or `spack-build-
out.txt` build log for details, e.g.: tail -15 $(spack location -i
apptainer)/.spack/spack-build-out.txt

dependencies.name: cryptsetup
dependencies.description: Cryptsetup and LUKS - open-source disk encryption.

dependencies.name: git
dependencies.description:
Git is a free and open source distributed version control system
designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with
speed and efficiency.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: go
dependencies.description: The golang compiler and build environment

dependencies.name: libgpg-error
dependencies.description: Common error values for all GnuPG components.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: shadow
dependencies.description:
Tools to help unprivileged users create uid and gid mappings in user
namespaces.

dependencies.name: squashfuse
dependencies.description: squashfuse - Mount SquashFS archives using FUSE

dependencies.name: uuid
dependencies.description:
OSSP uuid is a ISO-C:1999 application programming interface (API) and
corresponding command line interface (CLI) for the generation of DCE
1.1, ISO/IEC 11578:1996 and RFC 4122 compliant Universally Unique
Identifier (UUID).
